channel.title: switzerland on Miro's World
channel.description: Recent content in switzerland on Miro's World

item.title: Europe 2007 - 1
item.description: Europe 2007 - 1: Switzerland, Lower Engadin The flight went pretty quickly. It was less than 7 hours, anyway. We crossed the night and the Atlantic in a short time and landed at 6 AM in rainy, wet Zurich. The car I have retrieved from Europa car was Spanish Volkswagen make – Seat Leon. According the specification, it was a “medium size car”. And it maybe was, for European circumstances.
